entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
